page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {Ladybank}is a{small rural town}with a population of{1440.There are 12 small {shops in Ladybank,3 licensed grocers {and 1 general merchant,a butcher,a {wool shop,chemist,sub post office,a {newsagent,a hairdresser,a jewellers,a {fish'n'chip}shop.These shops employ less than{20}people.There are{13}small business firms employing{60}local people.The{majority of adults commute distances of between{7 and 17}miles.We have{2 Plant Hirers,a sawmill,a petrol {station and workshop,a decorator,a {joiner,a tractor plant,a lorry {company,a precision engineering {firm,an electrician and a fabrication {manufacturer.We are fortunate}to have a popular auction room and an{18 hole golf course.There is a railway station with an{hourly service to 2 main {cities.
